author: Kalina N
title: Versatile Wellness Patch Lines - Laki Naturals Introduces Patches Designed to Address Various Needs (TrendHunter.com)
text:
The wellness patch has proven to be a desirable and non-invasive treatment that is popular with consumers who are looking to seamlessly elevate their everyday routine. Laki Naturals boasts a series of wellness patches that are catered to different needs.
The Relax Patch, for instance, is infused with the natural calming properties of Ashwagandha, Lavender, Magnesium, Chamomile, and L-Theanine. The Fly Calm Patch, on the other hand, builds on the effects of its predecessor and offers discreet, easy-to-use, and time-released relief for extended periods. The Renew Patch is crafted to support the body's natural detoxification process while the Man Passion Patch is specially formulated to enhance male libido and sexual performance through the use of herbal botanicals and extracts.
Lake Naturals' wellness patches are hypoallergenic, latex-free, and paraben-free.
Image Credit: Lake Naturals
Laki Naturals Introduces Patches Designed to Address Various Needs
References:
lakinaturals
Trend Themes
1. Versatile Wellness Patches - Wellness patches that can cater to different needs are on the rise, offering a variety of benefits for consumers.
2. Natural Calming Properties - Patches infused with natural calming ingredients are gaining popularity as a non-invasive way to elevate everyday routines.
3. Extended Relief - Time-released patches that offer discreet, easy-to-use relief for extended periods are in demand by consumers.
Industry Implications
1. Health and Wellness - The health and wellness industry can tap into the growing demand for versatile wellness patches that cater to different needs.
2. Alternative Medicine - The alternative medicine industry has an opportunity to explore the use of natural calming ingredients in wellness patches.
3. Personal Care - The personal care industry can innovate with time-released patches that provide extended relief and convenience for consumers.
